messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] immuno
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I think if people don t vaccinate they have to understand the importance of diet. We are vegans and don t vaccinate. We also practice extended nursing.
messages.messageBody:
Hi! I think if people don't vaccinate they have to understand the importance
of diet. We are vegans and don't vaccinate. We also practice extended
nursing. None of my 4 children have ever had to be on antibiotics or had an
ear infection. The oldest is 11. You really are what you eat! Eat things to
build your immune system. I am not saying this is easy in our culture
because we struggle with cravings all the time. But, I know from experience
it works!

>Just fyi - other than sometimes it does happen...
>
>P.S. I'm looking for an ISP in So Calif that doesn't require HSLDA

>
>Rachel in Southern California

messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to pop in here and say that my 11yod was hospitalized for witht
he Chicken Pox.  I've seen the poster child, and my daughter looked worse and
was so very ill.
Just fyi - other than sometimes it does happen...

P.S.  I'm looking for an ISP in So Calif that doesn't require HSLDA
insurance.  Can you refer me anywhere?

Rachel in Southern California
